description: A Dubonnet Rouge is an elegant,&nbsp;sweet wine perfect for Valentine’s Day. The classic cocktail that uses this liquor has become popular in recent years due to its rich flavor and elegance, making your loved ones feel like royalty on their special day! Plus, the addition of&nbsp;gin doubles up the nutty and earthy tones.
name: Dubonnet Cocktail

recipeInstructions.name: Pour all the ingredients into a mixing glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the glass with ice cubes. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the glass with ice cubes. Stir well.
